title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking tapestry weave
description: Landscape with a large pine tree in the foreground, its leaves obscuring part of the sky. A castle in shades of pink and yellow is in the middle ground, framed by distant mountains in violet and blue. A fringe of the cream-colored warp threads is on the top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 20th century.Medium: wool
Technique: interlocking tapestry weave. 1941-102-24.
